text: Policies of privacy privacy
Effective date: August 23, 2022
Update date: August 23, 2022
【introduction】
You are welcome to use our products and services!

We know the importance of personal information to you. Your trust is very important to us. We will strictly abide by laws and regulations to take corresponding security protection measures to protect your personal information security and controlling.

Based on this, the Nailing Service Provider (or "We") formulates this "Nail Privacy Policy" (hereinafter referred to as "this policy"/"this privacy policy") to help you fully understand the use of our products and services in your products and services.In the process, how will we collect, use, share, store, and protect your personal information, as well as how you can manage your personal information so that you can make better choices.

Before you start using our products and services, please read and understand this policy carefully. In particular, we should focus on reading the clauses we logging in the threatening of the body/coarse body to ensure that you fully understand and agree to use it before starting to use.
The professional vocabulary involved in this policy, we try to explain to you in a concise and popular expression in order to facilitate your understanding.
If you have any questions, opinions or suggestions on the content of this policy, you can contact us through the contact information at the end of this policy.

You agree that the privacy policy said that you have understood the functions provided by the application, and the necessary personal information required for functional operation, and give corresponding collection and use authorization, but it does not mean that you have agreed to open up additional functions and handle non -necessary personal information.The opening, processing non -necessary personal information and processing sensitive personal information, we will solicit your consent separately according to your actual usage.
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: You agree that the privacy policy indicates that it is authorized to collect and use the necessary personal information, but it does not mean that it will agree to start the additional functions and handle unnecessary personal information. This will solicit your consent separately according to the actual usage.

text: This privacy policy will help you understand the following:
1. Scope of application
2. Information collection and use
3. Provide information to the outside world
Fourth, your rights
5. Storage of information
6. Policy update
7. Protection of minors
Eight, contact us
Appendix: Related Definition
1. Scope of application

This policy is applicable to the various products and services provided by you provided by Dingtalk.com, AliWork.com, Nail Software, Nail Smart Hardware, and new forms that appeared with technology development.
If the affiliated company has a privacy policy for the products or services it provides you, the corresponding privacy policy is applicable to the corresponding products or services.

In addition to the relevant information collection and use activities described in this policy, this policy is not applicable to the third -party service providers of nails and other services provided by other third directions. Other services are suitable for the personal information collection and use rules that they explain to you.

When you install a third -party SaaS application and mini program, the use of personal information/corporate control data that such a third -party SaaS is organized by you or your organization is specifically explained to you.
2. Information collection and use
When you use our products/services, the personal information we need/may need to collect and use includes the following:
1. In order to realize the basic functions of providing you with our products and/or services, you must authorize us to collect and use the necessary information.
If you refuse to provide the corresponding information, you will not be able to use our products and/or services normally;
label: First Party Collection Information

text: 2. In order to provide you with additional functions to our products and/or services, you can choose to agree or disagree with the information we collected and used alone.

If you refuse to provide it, you will not be able to use related additional functions normally or cannot achieve the functional effects we intend to achieve, which will not affect your basic functions.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: We are here to remind you that we are committed to creating a variety of products and services to meet your needs.

Because there are many types and services we provide to you, and there are differences in the scope of the specific product/service selected by different users, the basic/additional functions and the personal information types and scope of personal information and use will be different. Please use specific ones.Product/service function shall prevail.

text: 4. Prevention of account security risk
When using the nail platform service, you inevitably disclose your personal information from the other party or the potential transaction of the transaction, such as contact or contact address.
In addition, you can also establish communication, exchange information or analysis content with our services.

Please protect your personal information properly, provides others only under the necessary circumstances, and do not trust the transaction through other trading tools to avoid the stolen information or even encounter telecommunications network fraud.

If you are worried about your personal information, especially your account or password, please contact our customer service immediately so that we can take corresponding measures based on your application.
You can also independently perform "account settings", "freezing and thawing", "privacy switch" in "My-Settings-Security Center", and submitting fraud complaints.
